title: Bits n' Bobs - Can take to Bustypes Oswestry next w/e

posts.content:
Righto,
Need the room in my garage and will be there in Aubrey. All used bites from 64 RHD.

1200 Engine - been sat on my workbench six months and I've nicked the dizzy. Was running sweet before removal but no warranty! £75

New front right brake cylinder £20

7 sq. m (1.5 rolls) eco-friendly 2" thick sheepwool insulation. Won't rot and is hygroscopic so no condensation!
Plus roll of aluminised bubble wrap for behind door cards: £20

N/S cab door mechanism for post 63 buses only. It's a bit stiff but could probably be revived in an ultrasonic bath. Only I haven't got one. You may have. £5

Rear tailgate lock mechanism. Condition as above. £5

Battery cable & copex £5

ill have the insulation stuff matey

ill pm you my mobile
